# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.development
.env.test
.env.production

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Runtime data
pids/
*.pid
*.seed

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Dependency directories
jspm_packages/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm
